discrip: We produce quality, design driven applications for customers
intro: We are a design and development consultancy specialising in web localisation and internationalisation. Let's build something your customers will love.

caseStudyTwo.heading: KESCA
caseStudyTwo.paragraph: Korea Europe Standards Certification Association (KESCA) is an organisation supported by the South Korean government. WeCraft created a Ruby on Rails website to facilitate mass form applications to KESCA as part of their delivery of GDPR audit and certification.

block.heading: Discovery
block.paragraph: Our initial interview and meeting allows us to have a deeper understanding of the client problems.

block.heading: Design
block.paragraph: Starting with sketches and post-it notes, driven by user experience this allows us to focus on the user experience.

block.heading: Prototype
block.paragraph: We develop an interactive prototype which we use to interview the client with for feedback.

block.heading: Localisation

block.paragraph: Our process is user driven, by focusing on the user journey we enable customers to have a seemless experience.

caseStudyOne.heading: DiversiTea
caseStudyOne.paragraph:
DiversiTea is a newly started artisan loose leaf tea curation startup. 

WeCraft worked with DiversiTea in order to make a stunning website that could help them spread the word and, in turn, allow more people to enjoy diverse teas.

text1.paragraph: If you have a project you'd like to discuss with us we'd love to hear from you.

testimonial.quote: It was incredible. Shockingly so and I am still coming down from it...
